product_name: Deuter ACT Lite 70 + 10 SL Pack - Women's
long_description: With its minimal weight and women-specific design, the women's Deuter ACT Lite 70 + 10 SL Pack is a sleek, lightweight and comfortable companion on extended backpacking trips. Slim pack body and compact hipbelt allow freedom of movement when trekking or mountaineering. Multi-layer hipbelt with pull-forward function makes it easy to fasten, even with heavy loads. Lightweight, multi-chamber aluminum X-frame. Separate bottom compartment, stretch front compartment, mesh side pockets and twin lid buckles provide more options for storage. Front gear loops on the Deuter ACT Lite 70 + 10 SL Pack let you easily attach a sleeping pad to the outside.
short_description: With its minimal weight and women-specific design, the women's Deuter ACT Lite 70 + 10 SL Pack is a sleek, lightweight and comfortable companion on extended backpacking trips.
